article_title: Do Obamacare's Challengers Have A 'Nutty,' 'Stupid' Or 'Screwy' Interpretation Of The Law?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Decades of health reform efforts have produced a myriad a proposals that conditioned federal financial assistance on states taking various actions such as setting up Exchanges. In light of this history, there is nothing "nutty," "stupid" or "screwy" in believing that Congress may have intended federal tax subsidies to be available only on state-run Exchanges.
